channel.title: CVE Feed for iePlexus -- Featured Content Gallery

item.title: CVE-2024-34424|2024-05-09T11:21:42.755Z -- iePlexus -- Featured Content Gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in iePlexus Featured Content Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Featured Content Gallery: from n/a through 3.2.0.
